      • lastDate

        private static int lastDate
        The latest date in the database of orders ie. the date of the last element of orderHistory Initialized as zero, but will be replaced when each day passes

    • Constructor Detail

      • Report

        public Report()
       throws java.io.IOException
        Creates a Report instance each time user asks to print report
        Throws:

    • Method Detail

      • resetReport

        private void resetReport()
        Resets the sales attribute of each MenuItem in histMenuItem and PromoItem in histPromoItems to zero before calculating the sales for the report

      • updateOrderHistory

        public static void updateOrderHistory(Reservation.Order myOrder)
                               throws java.io.IOException
        Called every time an invoice is printed ie. every time an order is confirmed Updates the database by adding a new order to today's todayOrderList
        Parameters:
        myOrder - The order to be added to the database
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • addNewDay

        public static void addNewDay()
        Adds a new todayOrderList to the database when a new day comes

      • calculateTotalSales

        public void calculateTotalSales(int periodStart,
                                int periodEnd)
        For each order in each day specified, sales of each MenuItem and PromoItem over the time period are calculated This value is then stored as an attribute of the corresponding MenuItems and PromoItems in histMenuItems and histPromoItems
        Parameters:
        periodStart - inputed by the user. Represents the number of days before today that the report should start from
        periodEnd - inputed by the user. Represents the number of days before today that the report should end at

      • getTotalRevenue

        public double getTotalRevenue()
        Accesses the sales attribute of each MenuItem in histMenuItems and PromoItem in histPromoItems and adds them all together
        Returns:
        the total sales the restaurant earned over the entire period

      • getSalesBreakdown

        public java.lang.String getSalesBreakdown(int periodStart,
                                          int periodEnd)
        Adds each individual MenuItem and PromoItem's sales and the total revenue to the string salesBreakdown
        Parameters:
        periodStart - inputed by the user. Represents the number of days before today that the report should start from
        periodEnd - inputed by the user. Represents the number of days before today that the report should end at
        Returns:
        the string which contains the sales of the individual MenuItems and PromoItems and the total sales revenue

      • printReport

        public void printReport(int periodStart,
                        int periodEnd)
                 throws java.io.IOException
        Calls on FileReaderWriter to print the report onto a .txt file
        Parameters:
        periodStart - inputed by the user. Represents the number of days before today that the report should start from
        periodEnd - inputed by the user. Represents the number of days before today that the report should end at
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - When writing to the file fails

      • viewHistoricalMenu

        public void viewHistoricalMenu()
        Prints out the historical menu using histMenuItems and histPromoItems

                         throws java.io.FileNotFoundException,
                                java.io.IOException

        Parameters:
        item - The PromoItem to be added
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException - The exception where the file is not present
        java.io.IOException - When reading from the file fails

                         throws java.io.FileNotFoundException,

        Loads .txt files and saves them into the historical menus
